notes: Function calls (math and time) in streaming mode - this tests the challenging scenario of tool calls with streaming
requestBody: {"stream":true,"tools":[{"name":"calculate_math","type":"function","parameters":{"required":["expression"],"properties":{"expression":{"description":"Mathematical expression to evaluate","type":"string"}},"type":"object"},"description":"Perform mathematical calculations"},{"name":"get_current_time","type":"function","parameters":{"type":"object","properties":{"timezone":{"description":"Timezone identifier (e.g., 'America\/New_York')","type":"string"}},"required":["timezone"]},"description":"Get the current time in a specific timezone"}],"max_output_tokens":200,"input":[{"content":[{"text":"You are a helpful assistant with math and time capabilities.","type":"input_text"}],"role":"system"},{"content":[{"type":"input_text","text":"Calculate the square root of 144, then tell me the current time in Tokyo timezone."}],"role":"user"}],"model":"gpt-5-nano"}
